articles.title: Anthropic Launches Enterprise Claude with Million-Token Context
articles.titleZh: Anthropic 推出 Enterprise 版 Claude，支援百萬 Token 長上下文
articles.summary: Anthropic announced Enterprise Claude with expanded context window support for large-scale business applications.
articles.summaryZh: Anthropic 宣布推出企業版 Claude，擴展上下文窗口支持大規模商業應用。

articles.title: OpenAI GPT-5 Launch Imminent, Reasoning Leap Expected
articles.titleZh: OpenAI GPT-5 即將發布，據傳推理能力大躍進
articles.summary: Reports suggest OpenAI's GPT-5 will feature significantly improved reasoning capabilities, launching within weeks.
articles.summaryZh: 報導指出 OpenAI 的 GPT-5 將具備顯著改善的推理能力，將在數週內推出。

articles.title: Nvidia Market Cap Surpasses $4 Trillion, Highest Ever
articles.titleZh: Nvidia 市值突破 $4 兆，成史上最高市值公司
articles.summary: Nvidia's market capitalization reached a historic $4 trillion, driven by surging AI chip demand.
articles.summaryZh: 受 AI 晶片需求激增推動，Nvidia 市值達到歷史性的 4 兆美元。
